formattedAddress: 115 E 37th St, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: Eko is the best property manager I’ve ever met. He is very reactive and provide service as soon as possible. My 4 months tour in NYC is indispensable without his help.

text.text: Eko is the best property manager I’ve ever met. He is very reactive and provide service as soon as possible. My 4 months tour in NYC is indispensable without his help.

originalText.text: As like all the other people says, Eko is an amazing handyman.  He knows everything about the building and took care of every single issues I had in my room.  The building itself is old but maintained well.  Nice neighborhood.  Many international cuisine in walking distance.

text.text: As like all the other people says, Eko is an amazing handyman.  He knows everything about the building and took care of every single issues I had in my room.  The building itself is old but maintained well.  Nice neighborhood.  Many international cuisine in walking distance.

originalText.text: Eko is a great manager. He answers to my requests in time and is always proactive in assisting all kinds of demand! Really appreciate his help in everything.

text.text: Eko is a great manager. He answers to my requests in time and is always proactive in assisting all kinds of demand! Really appreciate his help in everything.

originalText.text: Eko is an amazing property manager! He has great communication whenever it is needed, and is very helpful and kind. The building is very new and well maintained. I would definitely recommend living here

text.text: Eko is an amazing property manager! He has great communication whenever it is needed, and is very helpful and kind. The building is very new and well maintained. I would definitely recommend living here

originalText.text: I've had a great experience living here. Apartment was clean upon move in and the monthly cleaning service is a nice bonus. Eko and all of the staff are great and quick to respond and fix any problems that arise. Move out process was smooth!
